name: Currency exchange rates app
description: A currency exchange app built as an initial assessment to demonstrate my skills. Developed with Next.js and TypeScript, using Redux and async thunks to fetch real-time exchange rates.

name: My portfolio
description: This portfolio web app is my way of showcasing both my technical skills and creativity. It reflects who I am as a developer and highlights the areas I’m most passionate about.

name: KONGWallet Landing page
description: Landing page for our upcoming web app, where users can learn about the product and subscribe for updates and the wallet’s release date.
